QuestData.Title: A Binding Contract
QuestData.Description: The undersigned hereby declares that the Sulfuron ingot they are delivering to the Thorium Brotherhood (TB Ltd.) is genuine and not a facsimile thereof. The undersigned also acknowledges that any harm that should come to $g him:her; as a result of attempting to build, forge, find, create, sell, or eat Sulfuras, is not the responsibility or fault of TB Ltd.$B$BBy signing this contract, you are agreeing to all terms listed herein.$B$B_________________$B$BSignature
QuestData.LogDescription: Turn the Thorium Brotherhood Contract in to Lokhtos Darkbargainer if you would like to receive the plans for Sulfuron.
QuestData.RewardText: It has been a pleasure doing business with you, $N!$B$BOn behalf of TB Ltd., I wish you luck in your search for Sulfuras!
